sentences.en: Baseline sonography findings - All lesions were located on the pancreatic tail.
sentences.cn: 基波超声所见― ― 所有病灶位于胰腺的尾部.

sentences.en: Cells showing immunoreactivity to pancreatic polypeptide, glucagon and substance - P were not detected.
sentences.cn: 胰高血糖素 、 胰多肽和P - 物质在消化道各段均未检出阳性细胞.

sentences.en: Chronic inflammation has been linked to pancreatic cancer risk.
sentences.cn: 慢性炎症可能会和胰腺癌有关系.

sentences.en: Inbred mice of the DBA / 2 strain developed severe necrotizing lesions of the pancreatic islets.
sentences.cn: 近亲繁殖的DBA/2系小白鼠发生了胰岛严重坏孢病变.

sentences.en: Objective In order to realize the false positive of pancreatic amylase.
sentences.cn: 目的了解胰淀粉酶测定的假阳性问题.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss diagnosis and treatment of pancreatic ascites.
sentences.cn: 目的提高对胰性腹水的认识和诊治水平.

sentences.en: Objective To improve the treatment of hepatobiliary, pancreatic and splenic injury.
sentences.cn: 目的提高外伤性肝胆胰脾损伤的治疗效果.

sentences.en: Objective: Ampulla being obstructed can cause cholestasis and pancreatic juice regurgitation.
sentences.cn: 目的: 胰胆管壶腹梗阻可引起胆汁淤积及胰液反流.
胰腺脓肿显然需要引流.

sentences.en: PDB can protect effectively the pancreatic islet B cells.
sentences.cn: 结论翻白草能有效保护胰岛B细胞.

sentences.en: The Ascaris adults may perforate a suture line or cause a bile or pancreatic duct obstruction.
sentences.cn: 成虫可穿破缝线或引起胆管或胰腺管阻塞.

sentences.en: The comprehensive methods for diagnosing cholangio - pancreatic disease were introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍胰胆系疾病的综合影像诊断方法.

sentences.en: The control of pancreatic secretion is performed mainly through 2 hormones.
sentences.cn: 胰腺的分泌作用主要为两种激素控制.

sentences.en: The pancreatic endocrine and exocrine functions and renal functions were monitored.
sentences.cn: 术后监测胰腺内分泌功能、胰液分泌及肾功能.

sentences.en: The starch - digesting amylase produced by the pancreas and present in pancreatic juice.
sentences.cn: 小肠内产生的助消化的荷尔蒙;刺激胰腺和肝脏.

phrases.tran_cn: 胰管；胰腺管；霍夫曼氏管

trans.tran_en: Pancreatic means relating to or involving the pancreas
